cast.overview: From a riddle-speaking butterfly, a unicorn learns that she is supposedly the last of her kind, all the others having been herded away by the Red Bull. The unicorn sets out to discover the truth behind the butterfly's words. She is eventually joined on her quest by Schmendrick, a second-rate magician, and Molly Grue, a now middle-aged woman who dreamed all her life of seeing a unicorn. Their journey leads them far from home, all the way to the castle of King Haggard.
cast.title: The Last Unicorn

details.biography:
Tammy Lee Grimes (January 30, 1934 – October 30, 2016) was an American actress and singer. Grimes won two Tony Awards in her career, the first for originating the role of Molly Tobin in the musical The Unsinkable Molly Brown and the second for starring in a 1970 revival of Private Lives as Amanda Prynne.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Tammy Grimes, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Tammy Grimes
